biography: Dr. Anil Bhansali is a distinguished endocrinologist and former Head of the Department of Endocrinology at PGIMER, Chandigarh. With over 30 years of teaching and research experience, he is a leading authority on diabetes and metabolic disorders in India. He has authored several foundational textbooks, including 'Clinical Rounds in Endocrinology', and has over 500 scientific publications. He is a recipient of the prestigious Dr. B. C. Roy Award in the Eminent Medical Teacher category.
aiSummary: Anil Bhansali is a endocrinology specialist with an H-index of 110 at PGIMER Chandigarh (Professor & Head (Former)). Known for pioneered Established genetic analysis for Metabolic Bone Disorders at PGIMER, Initiated Insulin Clamp study facilities in northern India. Has been published in The Lancet, The Lancet Planetary Health, The Lancet Diabetes & Endocrinology and recipient of the undefined (undefined). Based in Chandigarh, Chandigarh, India.
